sections.heading: 01|County auditor - term of office
sections.text: Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFA county auditor shall be chosen quadrennially in each county, who shall hold his office for four years, commencing on the second Monday in March next aft

sections.heading: the Revised Code applies to the   apportionment of special assessments.
sections.text: the Revised Code applies to the apportionment of special assessments.
